extendedInfo.description: BF3 StatsThe app uses the public api provided by bf3stats to retrieve the stats of your favourite players. In case you can't find a particular player, please visit bf3stats.com.At this point I want to thank all guys from bf3stats (especially 1ApRiL) for giving us the opportunity to create apps powered by their apis!Features:List of playersSupport for PC, PS3 and XboxGeneral Stats, Combat Stats, Kits Stats, ProgressComing soon:Language supportMore player stats (Weapons, Pins, Insignias)Unlock previewPlayer comparisonPowered by bf3stats.com

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: It shows i am rank 0 and have done nothing. Im actually rank 62 !! Fix this please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: It shows me at rank 7 when I\'m actually rank 38. Way outdated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sha1983
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t give you. An update always stays the same once installed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: USELESS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: It says I\'m a level 1, when I\'m a Colonel Service Star 8. It doesn\'t let you view any of your weapon or vehicle stats. Download \'Battlefield BF3 Stats\' it\'s so much better!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: For basic stat progression its not a bad app.  Just needs to expand more, ie weapon unlocks, recent games played, stats on each gun you use, and tips for each map would be nice.  This app just needs more content.
reviews.author: A Google User
